data.what_is: WE PROVIDE CLOUD-BASED SOFTWARE-AS-A-SERVICE PAYMENT ANALYTICS AND CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT PLATFORM TO BUSINESSES
data.product_description: WE PROVIDE CLOUD-BASED SOFTWARE-AS-A-SERVICE PAYMENT ANALYTICS AND CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT PLATFORM TO BUSINESSES

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about UMarket?
I like the fact that integrates all necessary logistic services for an integral End to End in the delivery industry. Logistic + storage + courier service? That's a nice combo you got there.

What do you dislike about UMarket?
I dislike that in 2022 better User experience is permeating throughout All industries. A poor user interface will not stand the fierce "drag and droppy" workflows.

Recommendations to others considering UMarket:
If you are looking for lab supplies to office products, UMarket is a one-stop shopping tool that has competitive overall prices.

What problems is UMarket solving and how is that benefiting you?
I solve pretty much my logistic problems with UMarket, especially while operating in the Minneapolis area. The benefits are solid logistic advantages streamlining processes throughout the UMarket network while focusing on my core business.
